name: Midnight
description: Midnight Evergreen is a blockchain-based gaming ecosystem that connects multiple MMO (Massively Multiplayer Online), games through its native ecosystem token, $NIGHT. Built on the Aptos blockchain, it enables players to carry their in-game assets, progress, and characters seamlessly across different games within the Evergreen platform. Midnight will be the first Web3.0 deconstructed MMO gaming ecosystem.
